data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Ranga Reddy prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ranga Reddy, Telangana, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Ranga Reddy, Telangana, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Ranga Reddy to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Ranga Reddy, Telangana, India.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Chalvadi people.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Ranga Reddy, Telangana, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Ranga Reddy to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 2,542,200 people living in Ranga Reddy, Telangana, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.
